caption.title: Summary of HDCS in S. Typhimurium main phylogroup.
caption.p: The presence of HDCS alleles was determined in-silico using SRST2 reported in Fig 1. The study identifier refers to isolates in S1 Table. Alleles are specified as wild-type (WT) or HDCS. In some cases, multiple HDCS forms were determined to be present and these are denoted as HDCS1 or HDCS2 etc. Table can be viewed at https://www.dropbox.com/sh/dh84yyc4tguirw3/AABnbbrSPtqEcjGY6IR6GggLa?dl=0.
Click here for additional data file.
